ComicInfo.Title: The Change In Your Nature Part Two
ComicInfo.Summary:
Now shipping monthly! The Ascenticon Guard, Security Operations, and The Rise are caught in a three-way faceoff. Cybertron is teetering on the brink of chaos, but there is still hope for peace. And leading the way to restore that peace are the only bots that make sense: Megatron, Soundwave, and Starscream!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Kei Zama (a) & Josh Burcham (c) | 1 | B | Cover B | Priscilla Tramontano | 2 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover | Sara Pitre-Durocher | 3 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-24 19:13:11. [CVDB726085]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Josh Burcham, Kei Zama, Priscilla Tramontano, Sara Pitre-Durocher
ComicInfo.Genre: Movies & TV, Action/Adventure, Science Fiction, Robots, Cyborgs & Mecha
ComicInfo.Characters: Acid Storm, Bumblebee, Chromia, Elita-One, Flak, Geomotus, Javelin , Jhiaxus, Kup, Landmine, Megatron, Nautica, Prowl, Reflector, Road Rage, Ruckus, Sideswipe, Soundwave, Springer, Stakeout, Starscream, Strika, Strongarm
